text: Sano naga n’di wakusimonga (mmwe Muhammadi ﷺ ya kakanile ka makafili), basi chakusimosya nnope nikuwecheta kwao (kwanti): “Ana tuli tusyuchile litaka, nambo yakuona uwwejo tuchiwa soni mu kagumbidwe kasambano?” Wanganyao ni awala wanganankulupilila M’mbuje gwao, soni wanganyao makongwa tigakawe mu ngosi mwao, soni wanganyao niwandu wa ku Moto, wanyao kwalakweko takawe wandamo
